title: [TomTom]Tractionloss Voice output is still active [10032827]
processed_text:
### Summary
An audio warning message for a traction loss event is erroneously played when approaching the event at speeds above 50 km/h. This occurs despite the expected behavior of no audio message being played. Identifiers include "messageId=795e03ba-8749-3f98-ae86-75b899bcde1d", "combinedEventCode=210600", and status "NavTrafficAnnouncementState_VOICE_PROMPT_ACTIVE".

### Example Good Summary
- "Traction loss event incorrectly triggers voice warning at speeds over 50 km/h when approaching event (messageId=795e03ba-8749-3f98-ae86-75b899bcde1d)."

### Avoid
- Overly detailed preconditions and steps unless they uniquely identify the problem.
- Specific timestamps, unless part of error patterns.
- "Bug", "issue", or similar terminology.
